profile_process_audio::clip_card_3::goal: Record your character at the next significant step in the process.
profile_process_audio::clip_card_0::goal: Record your character getting ready to start the process. How do they prepare?
profile_process_audio::clip_card_4::goal: Record sounds that tell the audience what is happening.
profile_process_audio::clip_card_6::goal: Record your character completing the process. The more dramatic, the better.
profile_process_audio::clip_card_1::goal: Record the very beginning or first step of the process.
profile_process_audio::clip_card_5::goal: If your story is about something your character does with an audience or people watching, record their reaction.
profile_process_audio::clip_card_7::goal: Conclude the story, tell us how it ended.
Record your character concluding the process.
profile_process_audio::clip_card_2::goal: Record sounds of where the process is taking place.
